languages.text: "Не стоит их жалеть — они стали орудием в руках врага. Ксеносы хотели пошатнуть наш боевой дух и, судя по вашим словам, добились цели".
languages.translation_comment:
On Vheabos VI.
Abelard: "Vheabos VI always was a penal world, but this... even the miscreants of this place do not deserve such a fate."

traits.locale_text: "Не стоит их жалеть — они стали орудием в рука врага. Ксеносы хотели пошатнуть наш боевой дух и, судя по вашим словам, добились цели".

languages.text: "Do not pity them — they became weapons in the enemy's hands. The xenos wanted to shake our spirit, and, judging by your words, they were successful."
languages.translation_comment:
On Vheabos VI.
Abelard: "Vheabos VI always was a penal world, but this... even the miscreants of this place do not deserve such a fate."
languages.original_text: "Не стоит их жалеть — они стали орудием в руках врага. Ксеносы хотели пошатнуть наш боевой дух и, судя по вашим словам, добились цели".

traits.locale_text: "Do not pity them — they became weapons in the enemy's hands. The xenos wanted to shake our spirit, and, judging by your words, they were successful."
"Do not pity them — they became weapons in the enemy's hands. The xenos wanted to shake our spirit, and, judging by your words, they were successful."
"Do not pity them — they became weapons in the enemy's hands. The xenos wanted to shake our spirit, and, judging by your words, they were successful."

"Do not pity them — they became weapons in the enemy's hands. The xenos wanted to shake our spirit, and, judging by your words, they were successful."
"Do not pity them — they became weapons in the enemy's hands. The xenos wanted to shake our spirit, and, judging by your words, they were successful."

languages.text: 「奴らに同情はするな。敵の手に堕ちた時点で、奴らは武器になったんだ。異種族どもは俺たちの士気を挫こうとした…そしてお前の言葉を聞く限り、その目的は果たされたようだな」
languages.original_text: "Do not pity them — they became weapons in the enemy's hands. The xenos wanted to shake our spirit, and, judging by your words, they were successful."

traits.locale_text: 「奴らに同情はするな。敵の手に堕ちた時点で、奴らは武器になったんだ。異種族どもは俺たちの士気を挫こうとした…そしてお前の言葉を聞く限り、その目的は果たされたようだな」

languages.text: "Bemitleidet sie nicht, sie sind zu Waffen in den Händen des Feindes geworden. Die Xenos wollten unsere Moral erschüttern, und Euren Worten nach zu urteilen, waren sie erfolgreich."
languages.original_text: "Do not pity them — they became weapons in the enemy's hands. The xenos wanted to shake our spirit, and, judging by your words, they were successful."

traits.locale_text: "Bemitleidet sie nicht, sie sind zu Waffen in den Händen des Feindes geworden. Die Xenos wollten unsere Moral erschüttern, und Euren Worten nach zu urteilen, waren sie erfolgreich."

languages.text: « Ne vous apitoyez pas sur leur sort. Ils sont devenus des armes entre les mains de l'ennemi. Les xénos cherchaient à nous ébranler et semblent avoir réussi, à en juger par votre réaction. »
languages.original_text: "Do not pity them — they became weapons in the enemy's hands. The xenos wanted to shake our spirit, and, judging by your words, they were successful."

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous apitoyez pas sur leur sort. Ils sont devenus des armes entre les mains de l'ennemi. Les xénos cherchaient à nous ébranler et semblent avoir réussi, à en juger par votre réaction. »

languages.text: «No los compadezca; se convirtieron en armas en manos del enemigo. Los xenos querían quebrantar nuestro espíritu, y a juzgar por sus palabras, lo han conseguido».
languages.original_text: "Do not pity them — they became weapons in the enemy's hands. The xenos wanted to shake our spirit, and, judging by your words, they were successful."

traits.locale_text: «No los compadezca; se convirtieron en armas en manos del enemigo. Los xenos querían quebrantar nuestro espíritu, y a juzgar por sus palabras, lo han conseguido».

languages.text: “无需怜悯他们，他们落入了敌人手中，沦为了敌人的武器。那些异形打算动摇我们的信念，而从你的发言来看，他们成功了。”
languages.original_text: "Do not pity them — they became weapons in the enemy's hands. The xenos wanted to shake our spirit, and, judging by your words, they were successful."

traits.locale_text: “无需怜悯他们，他们落入了敌人手中，沦为了敌人的武器。那些异形打算动摇我们的信念，而从你的发言来看，他们成功了。”

languages.text: "Düşmanlarının elinde silaha dönüştüler, merhameti hak etmiyorlar. Zenoların amacı bizi sarsmaktı, sözlerine bakılırsa emellerine ulaşmışlar."
languages.original_text: "Do not pity them — they became weapons in the enemy's hands. The xenos wanted to shake our spirit, and, judging by your words, they were successful."

traits.locale_text: "Düşmanlarının elinde silaha dönüştüler, merhameti hak etmiyorlar. Zenoların amacı bizi sarsmaktı, sözlerine bakılırsa emellerine ulaşmışlar."

languages.original_text: "Do not pity them — they became weapons in the enemy's hands. The xenos wanted to shake our spirit, and, judging by your words, they were successful."
